Woollo uses information gathered through its mobile app to improve its own services, but it does not share customer data_______
The mayor's attendance at the gathering marked his first public appearance_______nearly a month.

Ms. Ok has been tasked with investigating_______ standard procedures are beingproperly followed.
The establishment of the call center complex will make Blundell's economy less _______on manufacturing.
Despite their careful preparations, the party's caterers were forced to_______when the refrigeration unit suddenly broke down.
The most popular of Mortel Consulting's leadership seminars teaches managers how to foster teamwork while respecting employee_______
